DataElement.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Fasting Flag Sentinel CDM Fasting Status Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._Abstaining from food.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Fasting Indicator. Not all laboratory tests are differentiated by fasting status. For laboratory tests where fasting status is not considered to interpret results, Fast_Ind is marked X (not applicable). For laboratory test results where fasting status may be considered to interpreting results (e.g., glucose), Fast_Ind is marked F (fasting) only if the source data included with the laboratory test result indicates fasting test. All other laboratory test results where fasting status may be considered that is not explicitly marked as fasting, Fast_Ind is marked R (random).

Concepts.definition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Concepts.definition: An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Fasting Indicator. Not all laboratory tests are differentiated by fasting status. For laboratory tests where fasting status is not considered to interpret results, Fast_Ind is marked X (not applicable). For laboratory test results where fasting status may be considered to interpreting results (e.g., glucose), Fast_Ind is marked F (fasting) only if the source data included with the laboratory test result indicates fasting test. All other laboratory test results where fasting status may be considered that is not explicitly marked as fasting, Fast_Ind is marked R (random).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Governed by or depending on chance; lacking any definite plan or order or purpose.

Concepts.definition: Governed by or depending on chance; lacking any definite plan or order or purpose.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
